name: Eneider
description:
Eneider is a top-down RPG game, where you can write your own history and build your civilization, in a single-server massive multiplayer based on Unity.

Eneider is an “exclusively multiplayer” game, divided into sectors; each player is part of the same world, and each player can meet up with anyone if they are in the same sector of the map.

Eneider has different types of resources that the player must obtain to build the village.

Some structures require some workers, and this requires citizens with stable housing and food.

We added a complex crafting schemes for more expensive and advanced buildings, such as a University or a Market,

We also brought to life the true essence of Eneider, not only the development of a civilisation, but also real-time wars with other players and other villages.

We added Camps, Barracks, different types of Soldiers, and the ability to set fire to enemy buildings.
